name: HotelTransylvaniaStories
0:
”Alexa, open Hotel Transylvania.”
”Alexa, tell Hotel Transylvania to sing a nursery rhyme.”
”Alexa, ask Hotel Transylvania to read me a story.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hotel transylvania
des:
The monsters from the new movie Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation, come together in this fun kids skill. Drac’s Pack will read you a monster story or sing you a nursery rhyme with a monster twist. You can also meet members of Drac's Pack.

It’s as easy as, “Alexa, tell Hotel Transylvania to sing a nursery rhyme”. Look online for secret phrases that unlock hidden monster surprises such as, “Alexa, ask Hotel Transylvania for a joke”.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
